# PROJET PHP 
## Auteurs
- Philippe FAISANDIER
- Evan PAUTOT

## Installation
```shell
cd /path/to/project
cd front/
npm i
npm run build
# Run the above command at every changes made in the `front/` directory
# It needs to be run because the php server only serves static files
# generated by the compiler
cd ..
php -S 0.0.0.0:8080
```
